ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: We covered the most important thinkers who were critical of the Enlightenment. Yes, I would recommend the course to a fellow student.
Yes, but the readings are intellectually very demanding. I would recommend this class to those who are motivated and have the commitment to spend time reading the texts with great detail.
I would recommend the course, particularly as preparation for comprehensive exams.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It was a really important course for the theoretical requirements of my thesis.
The course helped me to understand modernity, rationality, and the theoretical background which underpin modern political issues. The course was truly illuminating.
The course aligned directly with one of my comprehensive exam fields.
